name: Oliver
personality: Playful, curious, and talks a lot
looking_for: A cuddle buddy who shares snacks
bio: Catch me knocking things off tables and stealing hearts.

name: Luna
looking_for: A chill lap to nap on
bio: Don't let the fluff fool you. I'm deep, not dramatic.

name: Cleo
looking_for: Someone to share warm laundry piles with
bio: I purr loudly and judge gently.

name: Midnight
personality: Cool, confident, a bit aloof but loyal
looking_for: An equal in charisma and style
bio: I wear shades because my future's that bright.
